Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the interior is lightly covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394344) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394344)
